entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
